website_summaries.verdict: Made of durable, thick plastic, these holders stack on their ends for easy storage or presentation.
pros: Thick, durable plastic is dishwasher and freezer safe
Works well for both hard and soft taco shells
other size packs are also available
Ends slide together for easy storage
cons: Not for use in a microwave
Some claim that the bottom curve is too wide
both soft and hard shell tacos won't stand up well

customer_reviews.title: Great taco shell holders, holds small fried fish too!
customer_reviews.text: We have really enjoyed having these taco holders. We got tired of having the ingredients spill out when they fell over. * The flat bottom shells fit in well. Some shells are more snug than others, but they all fit. An added and unexpected bonus was the use of holding whole fried fish (after they cooled down and the oil wouldn't melt the plastic). After we fry the fish, if it lays on one side for too long on a plate with paper towels, it loses its crispness. The crunchy skin is one of the best parts.
customer_reviews.author: Thai Mizzou

customer_reviews.title: Keeps them tacos upright
customer_reviews.text: These are really handy for the kids and keeping the tacos upright. I was going to get a different set that took up less room, but read that they weren't sturdy enough to hold up a stuffed taco. We have had no problems with these holders and taco spillage. I also like that you can use one alone or have them hooked together. I only give them 4 stars because it can be hard to get them together. Some slide onto each other easily and others take some real force. They snap apart easily, although I'm always afraid I'm going to break the plastic but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must for taco lovers
customer_reviews.text: How have I gone YEARS without these?!?! Our family does Taco Tuesday, well, every Tuesday and sometimes on other days of the week. Don't judge us. We live in CA and this is just what we eat here. I would make all three of my tacos at once so I didn't have to reach for the fixin's over and over. But then everything would fall out. Ugh. Then I finally caved and got these. My life is completely different. It's changed. I'm a new woman on Taco Tuesdays, and sometimes Fridays, and Sundays. Again, don't judge. Just try these out if you love, or even like tacos.
customer_reviews.author: K. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Tacos Yay!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought these as a gift for someone else because I already own them - and LOVE them! Everyone who comes to our house on Taco Tuesday wants a set so I'm starting to make good on my threats. I just hope these are the same quality as the set I bought for myself last year.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: One that works!
customer_reviews.text: I had some Tupperware taco stands that I gave to my daughter and I wanted some new ones. Unfortunately, I couldn't find the Tupperware stands so I ended up buying these. They actually work better! They come apart for storage and cleaning and for portioning. Very sturdy plastic and just plain fun!
customer_reviews.author: J Holland

customer_reviews.title: Makes tacos quicker
customer_reviews.text: Now i can just put the shells in these and make all my tacos at the same time and then munch away! The interlocking is good because you can judge how many you want to lock together to fit your plate nicely. Keeps it together well. I'd like to post something negative to give a balanced view but I really can't think of anything negative.
customer_reviews.author: jim b

customer_reviews.title: Great little taco holders!
customer_reviews.text: I love these taco holders! I like the flat bottoms as they are a bit more stable than others I've used. I also like that they can connect and then stand up on their side to take up less space in the cupboard. I guess if you plan on having a whole lot of tacos you might want to look into some stackable holders, but I prefer the sturdy construction of these.
customer_reviews.author: T4FF3R

customer_reviews.title: The BEST inexpensive purchase you will EVER make!!!
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lifetime of filling taco shells that were laying on their sides with delicious ingredients that refused to stay in the horizontal shells. These inexpensive shell holders have brought an unexplainable amount of joy to my life! Taco Tuesdays will never be the same again!!! Why did I think this was an unnecessary purchase for so many years...WHY?????
customer_reviews.author: j_m1964

customer_reviews.title: No mess tacos!
customer_reviews.text: Love these taco stands! It is a novelty item, but one I use every time I make tacos. They make it easy to fill tacos and keep them from falling over on your plate. They can be connected or separated. Easy to wash too. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Mom from Boston

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly awesome and less weird than I thought
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't like buying products that have one use, but I got them for my taco-loving husband as a Christmas gift. They really are amazing, and I would buy them again! I love that they are adjustable, and not just in a 3pack or whatever the standard size is -- I can combine two for myself, and 6 for my husband lol. Seriously, these things seem like such a gimmicky joke, but they will change your taco-eating life.
customer_reviews.author: J. JesseTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Taco stands are a must have
customer_reviews.text: If you eat tacos and you don’t have stands, you are doing it wrong or a least making things harder for yourself. This particular one is a little shallow, but it works, and they are small enough that you can have at least three tacos on your plate.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy. Pricey but every time we had tacos ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy. Pricey but every time we had tacos and I didn't have these, it made my blood boil to know my taco was going to fall over. Ever try and prop three tacos up together. You're asking for failure. Buy these. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and work great
customer_reviews.text: These do work great . They were difficult to detach from one another but after that these work great. Very durable and well made .
customer_reviews.author: swwkennyg

customer_reviews.title: The taco stand works great. It holds the taco up so you can ...
customer_reviews.text: The taco stand works great. It holds the taco up so you can stuff it with all kinds of goodies. A soft tortilla tends to flop over the ends. I would design it better by making the holder longer for larger tortilla's and make it taller for the same reason.
customer_reviews.author: O'Davis

customer_reviews.title: Mucho Taco
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it interlocked so I can 2 or more and they'll all stay in place
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Heyward

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: So handy. Glad they come in rows of 4. But nice that they can be separated too
customer_reviews.author: Lynnette Walczak

customer_reviews.title: They work fine with any shell - premade or homemade!
customer_reviews.text: Compact enough to fit in a pocket, but large and sturdy enough to carry and use in a Taco Bell restaurant. Work great around the pool too! Makes preparing and eating tacos easy without any spilling. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Danielson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect connect-able 🌮 holder
customer_reviews.text: Does EXACTLY what It’s supposed to do..HOLD 🌮!!..And they are connectable,so u can snap 3-4-5-6 together..ALL NICE AND NEAT.👍..I definitely recommend them..
customer_reviews.author: Mike Cavill

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the money. It is exactly what it is described as. Easy cleaning and durable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Taco holders
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of this product. It is well made and can be used alone or connected in groups. Clever design. I just wish they were a little longer and taller as the soft tacos don't stand up as well which is why it is 4 instead of 5 stars. Quality product and a fast ship.
customer_reviews.author: A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Makes Filling Tacos So Easy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these little things! They snap together for however many tacos you want to make, and are sturdy enough on their own for filling a single taco. I make hardshell tacos with a little give, and they easily held the shell firm as I filled it with ingredients, keeping my hands free and seriously reducing the mess. Love 'em!
customer_reviews.author: Sandie H.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: These are the coolest things! We have tacos at least once a week and I always have the filling falling out. These were so useful. Easy to clean, these did the trick and are easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: S. T.

customer_reviews.title: It's so nice to eat a fully stuffed taco and know that ...
customer_reviews.text: Used these for the first time last week! It's so nice to eat a fully stuffed taco and know that it will be in an upright position when placed in the taco holder---without having everything fall out !! I know we will eat tacos more often now that we have these. They are wide enough to hold the larger sized taco shell, too.........A must have!!!
customer_reviews.author: Peppy

customer_reviews.title: Great Taco Stands
customer_reviews.text: Not only was the price right and the color, it actually works well for us. We used them shortly after it was delivered. We were pleased that it actually kept our tacos upright for filling. It was just what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Mistlet0e

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These things are FANTASTIC!! They slide together and snap apart! Rinse them off for another day. I use them with soft tacos and they stay put while you build your taco. You don't have to eat your taco all in one bite because you can actually sit your taco down in between bites. This is one of those things I can't believe I lived without for so many years! You may not use them every day, but you're super happy you have them when you need them!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin L Nash

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This product works exceptionally well for any size taco - either premade shells or your own creations. The design is brilliant in being very flexible - you can easily attach them together to use up to 4 on a standard size dinner plate or however you would like to use them. They wash easily and I recommend this product highly!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Such a clever idea & they work great..
customer_reviews.text: Such a clever idea & they work great.....especially with the wider shells ! Only "con" so far is that we find it difficult to separate them if you decide to connect the hilders per design. Probably a little vegetable oil or a spritz of PAM beforehand on each "mortise & tenon" would help !
customer_reviews.author: Machguy

customer_reviews.title: Holds large sized shells just fine.
customer_reviews.text: Have made taco nights so much easier, and a cinch to wash. I've made tacos more times in two months than I had my entire adult life, thanks to these. Holds large sized shells just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Taco holder
customer_reviews.text: Not very big but have held most tacos fine . A lot better than trying to hold them while you are trying to make o.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: We eat tacos every week, my kids and husband love them. Super easy to connect and separate. Very durable, really good quality. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amy morgan

customer_reviews.title: Cool that you can add on or take away pieces ...
customer_reviews.text: These just make taco Tuesdays that much easier! Works for both hard and soft tacos. Cool that you can add on or take away pieces for however many tacos you want. For the price, it is the perfect addition to taco night.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Senecal

customer_reviews.title: I love that you can take them apart or add more
customer_reviews.text: The taco stands worked perfectly...I love that you can take them apart or add more.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Rubenstein

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with these!
customer_reviews.text: Really happy I got these! They make a nice presentation of tacos and I was happy to see they can hold the larger Stand and Stuff type taco shells!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa K

customer_reviews.title: who knew taco's could be such fun
customer_reviews.text: had a taco bar gathering and everyone LOVED these! honestly, so easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: raymond rodda

customer_reviews.title: A must have for taco eaters.
customer_reviews.text: These are just what my husband said we needed. I really like how they can be taken apart to use only the number needed.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Small

customer_reviews.title: Taco holders
customer_reviews.text: These holders are great!! They attach to each other and also stand on their own when using only one. Dishwasher safe, microwave safe and colorful.
customer_reviews.author: FRED

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product - especially that we can piece together 5 for hubby and 2 for me, rather than being stuck with fixed increments of 4 like so many other choices. My one concern is snapping/unsnapping them - I'm afraid I'm going to break them due to the amount of force needed. Overall though, we're very happy and the seller was terrific!
customer_reviews.author: wdw1972

customer_reviews.title: gReat little taco holders
customer_reviews.text: gReat little taco holders. Makes it much easier to make the tacos and keep them up when you serve them to the family., Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Yami  Siesel

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Very useful, since you can fasten as many together as you'd like or use them individually.
customer_reviews.author: K. Vancko

customer_reviews.title: These holders are great!
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews, and chose this set. Perfect! Can't wait for taco night at our house! Exactly as described, easy to slide on or off for one to 8 tacos! I will be using these for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Thyme

customer_reviews.title: Tacos neat and easy!
customer_reviews.text: Holds tacos upright while putting them together and when eating them. Like the fact that they snap together making them even more stable. Really handy product.
customer_reviews.author: don s

customer_reviews.title: Tacos stay put.
customer_reviews.text: Tacos stay put. Tossed my cheap ones that kept falling over.
customer_reviews.author: Little guy

customer_reviews.title: They work but could be improved
customer_reviews.text: PROS: - Completely washable - They hold standard taco shells and maybe the wide ones too - They snap together and apart easily, and even in singles, they don't tip over CONS: Very slippery on the plate. I wish there was something on the bottom so they won't slide around (and off) the plate The reason I said they might hold a wide-bottom taco shell is because standard shells fall in the holders with just one bite taken. So they are only good to MAKE the taco. They don't hold up the taco well after you begin eating them.
customer_reviews.author: Karol Burnham

customer_reviews.title: sides too low
customer_reviews.text: Unique, quality made - unfortunately the sides are too low to hold a full soft taco well. They will do great for hard tacos.
customer_reviews.author: Hal

customer_reviews.title: Good Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I only received 4 of the 8 pieces but the problem was resolved with amazon so I’m happy with this gift purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Erykah

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to hold soft flour tortillas while I make fish tacos and was glad these work. They could be a little taller (I'm sure they must be made for shorter hard taco shells), but they get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: pickymel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work well with 6-inch and 10-inch shells. This product is well designed.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: good if you have skinny taco shells but it's difficult ...
customer_reviews.text: good if you have skinny taco shells but it's difficult to put the shells in all three if they're connected.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Z

customer_reviews.title: They are good quality but very narrow in design
customer_reviews.text: They are good quality but very narrow in design. You would not be able to hold a hot dog with the bun in them for example.
customer_reviews.author: ToDreamOutLoud

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They are perfect for the stand and stuff shells. Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Strauss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love these!! Super easy to use, easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: just perfect no more of a mess when I serve them
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needeit for my taco's , just perfect no more of a mess when I serve them .
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Alavez

customer_reviews.title: Standing Tacos!
customer_reviews.text: This inexpensive product is designed to hold 2 or 4 tacos. Perfect for Taco Tuesday.
customer_reviews.author: confused

customer_reviews.title: No more spilled taco's
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it was designed to do. cleans up in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.author: Jack Carfagno

customer_reviews.title: For Taco Lovers
customer_reviews.text: I knew this existed, but didn't know how or where. Very handy!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Great item, they are nice to hold premade (hard ...
customer_reviews.text: Great item, they are nice to hold premade (hard shell) tacos. I haven't tried them yet on corn tortillas, that I fry myself yet. I love that they are separate and not attached to a plate.
customer_reviews.author: Khowell2014

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the 8-pack and only received 4. Can’t return as item is not eligible. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are closer to what I am looking for to hold fish tacos.
customer_reviews.author: Rande Herrell

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my daughter, and by the time she told me they're too small to be practical, it was beyond the return date. Frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty Maven

customer_reviews.title: They look very sturdy for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought for a Christmas present. They look very sturdy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: debra venneman

customer_reviews.title: Taco Stand Up Holders
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy holders; really like the feature that they can be separated to how many you actually need for use.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I thought they would be taller. Soft shells do stand up so they do work.
customer_reviews.author: Beach girl

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our Taco Tuesdays & they are awesome! A must-have!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Krystof

customer_reviews.title: These are better quality than I thought they'd be- the plastic is ...
customer_reviews.text: These are better quality than I thought they'd be- the plastic is solid and not flimsy plus they work great!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Kessler

customer_reviews.title: No more falling tacos!!
customer_reviews.text: The taco stands are perfect! No more falling tacos! I will suggest these to all my hispanic lady friends. They will all love me for it!
customer_reviews.author: The Rudster

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you expect.
customer_reviews.text: not bad at all. I really like how they slide together for eady storage
customer_reviews.author: Michael Draper

customer_reviews.title: Colorful, durable and works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These came in handy at the taco bar. Great for hard and soft shells. Keeps ingredients in place and make for less messy eating.
customer_reviews.author: Buzzmaam

customer_reviews.title: Yasssss!
customer_reviews.text: Yaaaassss! What a time to be alive! Taco Tuesday's are some of the best days and have come to be a loved tradition. However, almost every night someone complains about their tacos falling over (first world problems!) I bought an 8 pack of these bad boys and Taco night is perfected. The holders easily slide in and out and are sturdy. They hold the tacos very well and we are so happy that we purchased them. They are also super easy to clean, just toss them in the dishwasher. A must for anyone who loves tacos, which means pretty much everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Juliana King

customer_reviews.title: To Big
customer_reviews.text: They are to big to stand the actual taco inside.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Took these on vacation
customer_reviews.text: We stay in timeshares and these taco stands were very useful in creating fish and chicken tacos for my family while on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: CarolL

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I've had the more flimsy stands before. These are far superior. Love how they slide together.
customer_reviews.author: Ccaito

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. My family always has issues with the taco falling or becoming too messy while trying to insert the ingredients for it. Now that we have these great stands, taco's are much easier to handle without making such a big mess.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Glad I choose these
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and durable. Glad I choose these. Can't wait to use these.
customer_reviews.author: loan ohland

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: They seem to hold a taco, as so claimed. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved these holders, made it so easy to assemble and serve my tacos! Friggin' great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them love them. they work great trinkets to treasures
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: Dish washer safe and sturdy. Stands can be attached to one another for speciific serving sizes or used individually. Bright red color.
customer_reviews.author: treva thigpen

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Really like these. Was exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Colleen I.

customer_reviews.title: Restaurant Quality
customer_reviews.text: Did a great job exactly what I wanted . Looks nice on the plate also .
customer_reviews.author: John J Brousseau

customer_reviews.title: too short
customer_reviews.text: They need to be an inch taller do not work as well with soft shells ok for hard shells Thx
customer_reviews.author: bryan c

customer_reviews.title: Now I can have tacos the way they were meant to be enjoyed.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected but totally worth the purchase! Impossible to find these at a local store. Now I can have tacos the way they were meant to be enjoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Svengo42

customer_reviews.title: great presentation combined with practical simplicity
customer_reviews.text: Standout Standup! I use these for classic street tacos (5.5 inch white corn tortillas). Practical simplicity, allows for great presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Will-i-am

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I thought they wear silacone rubber and could go in the oven. They wear cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Cannot use in microwave
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment! In the ad it does not mention that one cannot use them in the microwave. After I prepare the meat and cheese, I warm them up in the microwave. What is the point of preparing the tacos on the taco standup and then have to move them back on a plate where they will fall apart. They need to use a material that is safe for the microwave!
customer_reviews.author: nomdeplume

customer_reviews.title: GREAT taco holders!!
customer_reviews.text: I only buy the "Stand Up and Stuff" taco shells. They are too wide for most of the holders out there. These holders are fantastic!! My tacos not only fit them, but they are so easy to clean, put together and pull apart! And I love the bright color, too. Great buy, and highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharkgarden

customer_reviews.title: Genius
customer_reviews.text: Taco stands!?! Who ever heard of such a thing! I love using these to hold my soft or hard shell tacos. Now they aren't falling all over the plate into my rice and beans. These also make a great gift item because it isn't something everyone has in their kitchen yet.
customer_reviews.author: Labernatty

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I have used these with the stand up taco shells and while they do not fit all the way to the bottom this still manages to hold them up. I have found that regular taco shells fit easier, which I make into a double decker taco and they still fit perfect. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly good
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for heating my taco shells in the microwave and then eating at the table. Have to make sure you wash them good, it's that kind of plastic that holds the oils so it seems that I have to make an extra effort to clean. Other than that I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Bullit1987

customer_reviews.title: Perfect taco holder!
customer_reviews.text: Great product ... does exactly what it should do. Props up my tacos so I can fill them in the right way for me, view them in all their glory, and eat when ready. I also love that each is designed to connect with another, so I can have two or three or however many and they stay on the plate together. They wash well in the dishwasher, so they're easy to clean ... a great solution for the homemade-taco lover!
customer_reviews.author: Jason E. Rice

customer_reviews.title: YOU NEED THESE
customer_reviews.text: Taco Assembly = Perfection I bought these after struggling to fill my skillet corn tortillas. I couldn't get them to hold their shape without making a giant mess. Grabbed a set for my mom too. So easy to use. Easy to clean. Love that I can use 1 or all 8. Tacos make up 75% of my diet so needless to say, these get used often. Perfect gift for the person who has everything too!
customer_reviews.author: Jess A.

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I do love tacos and this set of stands makes both filling the shells and eating the tacos I make so much easier. No more having them fall over while I'm filling them or moving them to the table. I have used as few as four stands and up to six stands on a plate and it always works out the same. That is, no more mess. Once filled I just lift them out of the stand to eat. If you like hardshell tacos you will love these stands.
customer_reviews.author: David Gluck

customer_reviews.title: These are great taco holders
customer_reviews.text: These are great taco holders! I purchased them specifically for pigs in a blanket. Im a Lover of Home Chef meal service and I needed these for breakfast this weekend! These worked perfectly! I wish I bought these sooner!!
customer_reviews.author: TinyThomson

customer_reviews.title: Work Great!
customer_reviews.text: These make preparing and eating tacos so much easier. You avoid the tendency to overfill your tacos and have everything fall out all over the place. My husband really likes these.
customer_reviews.author: Kuma Purple

customer_reviews.title: Now you can hot sauce up as many tacos as you want!
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought these for us. I never knew how much I needed them until I had them. Great for making home made tacos for adults and especially the kids, as well as, Taco Bell runs. Now you can hot sauce up as many tacos as you want!
customer_reviews.author: dad2aaa

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Really great design but don’t work for boxed pre-made taco shells, they are too small for the taco shells to fit into.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Bowers

customer_reviews.title: These holders are slick and finally let me use "stand and stuff" tacos which I like to use as I can stuff them to my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a do-over from my last comments which arose from a order mixup. These holders are slick and finally let me use "stand and stuff" tacos which I like to use as I can stuff them to my hearts content.
customer_reviews.author: Bob K.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and useful
customer_reviews.text: These work great. They are very solid; and I like that they can connect.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J. Crow

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love these taco holders. They come apart easily and are easy to wash. The plastic is tough so not easy to break. Makes taco night easy and less messy!
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Tacos Stand Up When You are Making It
customer_reviews.text: I needed this gizmo to keep my Tacos standing up when making. Good design can be paired with another to make a multi taco unit. Price is very reasonable compared to steel units.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Sircar

customer_reviews.title: I think the stands work best with at least two or three connected together when ...
customer_reviews.text: The design is very clever. I think the stands work best with at least two or three connected together when filling and on plate, due to the fact that a single stand / holder tends to topple over. But, all in all I am very happy with the product. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: SMC

product_meta.title: Taco Stand Up Taco Stand Up Holders - 8 Pack
product_meta.description: Item Package Quantity:8About the handiest little problem solver to come along since pockets on shirts the innovative design with an interlocking "channel and key" built into its base gives tacostandups a unique usefulness. Serve 1, 2, 4, 6 or any number of tacos. There is almost no limit to the variations with which you can arrange your tacos for serving. Get creative preparation is twice as fast because now you have both hands free. No more balancing act -- no more taco fallout. Tacostandups work great and make your tacos look great on the plate. You'll serve your family and friends your delicious tacos in a visually pleasing, appetizing new way. Everyone absolutely loves new tacostandups and i promise that you will too. Tacostandups are dishwasher safe and stack on end back to back for convenient storage in your kitchen cabinets. They're made of durable, long lasting food grade abs plastic and have a nice "weighty" feel. Tacostandups are not intended for use in microwaves/ovens.
feature_bullets: GET CREATIVE – Preparation is twice as fast because now you have both hands-free. No more balancing act -- no more taco fallout!
GET CREATIVE – Preparation is twice as fast because now you have both hands-free. No more balancing act -- no more taco fallout!
DISHWASHER SAFE - TacoStandUps are super durable, and have a nice "weighty" feel. Dishwasher and Freezer safe. TacoStandUps are made of ABS and contain no BPA. Not for use in microwaves or ovens.
STACK AND STORE - TacoStandUps stack on end for convenient, space-saving storage.
COMPLETES YOUR KITCHEN – Now in use on tables in thousands of homes and restaurants worldwide, our original TacoStandUps work great for your crispy corn tortilla ‘hard shell’ tacos.
